parameter.name: host
parameter.label: Host
parameter.description: Hostname or IP address of TV.

parameter.name: key
parameter.label: Access Key
parameter.description: Key exchanged with TV after pairing.

parameter.name: macAddress
parameter.label: MAC Address
parameter.description: If MAC Address of TV is entered here, the binding will attempt to power on the device via Wake On Lan (WOL) when it receives command ON on channel power. Accepted value is six groups of two hexadecimal digits, separated by hyphens or colons, e.g '3c:cd:93:c2:20:e0'.
